attributes.action: Reject the call for compulsory dog insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The call for compulsory third party insurance and microchipping of dogs should be rejected as the people who it is designed to target are the very ones who will not carry out their obligations should this rule be introduced. It will cause more animals to be abandoned thus increasing the load on already overworked animal charities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
